name: Facebook Ireland Ltd.
address:

comments:
Various privacy controls (including the ability to download your data as HTML or JSON) are already available via the Facebook website: https://www.facebook.com/settings?tab=your_facebook_information

It is up to you to decide whether you still want to send a request to Facebook.
There seems to be a way to contact Facebook via this request form: https://www.facebook.com/help/contact/1461223320847982
